mapper.insert: insert into orders (ocode, sid, mid, pcode, ocount, oname, oaddrz, oaddr, oaddrd, ophone, ototal, omessage) values (#{ocode}, #{sid}, #{mid}, #{pcode}, #{ocount}, #{oname}, #{oaddrz}, #{oaddr}, #{oaddrd}, #{ophone}, #{ototal}, #{omessage})
mapper.select: select * from orders o join member m on o.mid = m.mid join product p on p.pcode = o.pcode where m.mid = #{mid}

select ocode, OREGDATE, p.pname as pname ,count(p.pname) as count, p.pfile as pfile,sum(ototal) as total from orders o join member m on o.mid = m.mid join product p on p.pcode = o.pcode where m.mid = #{mid} group by o.ocode order by oregdate desc
select * from orders o join member m on o.mid = m.mid join product p on p.pcode = o.pcode where ocode=#{ocode}
mapper.update: update orders set oname=#{oname}, oaddrz=#{oaddrz} , oaddr=#{oaddr} , oaddrd=#{oaddrd} , ophone=#{ophone}, omessage=#{omessage} where ocode=#{ocode}
mapper.select: select count(*) as listCnt from orders o join member m on o.mid = m.mid join seller s on o.sid = s.sid join product p on o.pcode = p.pcode where ${searchCategory} like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') and s.sid = #{id}
select * from orders o join member m on o.mid = m.mid join seller s on o.sid = s.sid join product p on o.pcode = p.pcode where ocode = #{ocode} and pname = #{pname}
